column6:
Something horrible happened in Pike's Reach. Five riders rode out of the red fog and unleashed hell on the little town and its people -- five riders who came from the bowels of hell and know a thing or two about the supernatural wraith that's been shadowing Travis Parham. High noon is coming. Can anything withstand it?,2007,6
32 PGS./Parental Advisory ...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Joe Caramagna | penciller (cover):Clayton Crain | writer:Stan Lee
